body_html: I am also facing the same issue for tf 1.4.1 . When I am passing each individual example ( observation ) and as a batch ( 10 , 32 , whatever ) , there is difference in values ( first pass is RNN (lstm) ). This leads to final change in my predicted probabilities, as I am doing a classification. Any ideas on this ?
